page.title: 07Ghosts 2
page.content: Once I was going up the stairs at my Nan's house.When I got to the top I walked across the landing.Then I heard the same noise that I did when I walked up the stairs.It was coming from the attic. So I walked down the stairs,I stood at the bottom and listened for something.Then I heard the same noise.It was coming from the attic again.So I opened the door and ran very fast through the living room then through the kitchen and outside. My nans house is about 150 years old and used to be a pub called 'The Bell' .Quite a lot of people have heard it and seen it.
